text.inventory_control_tweaks.name: Inventory Control Tweaks
text.autoconfig.inventory_control_tweaks: Configuració de Inventory Control Tweaks
key.inventory_control_tweaks.drag_all_ou: Drag all out of inventory modifier
key.inventory_control_tweaks.click_armor: Hi ha de fer clic per canviar el modificador d'armadura
key.inventory_control_tweaks.drag_all_st: Arrossegueu totes les piles pel modificador
text.autoconfig.inventory_control_tweaks: General
Activa l'intercanvi d'armadura
Feu clic amb el botó dret mentre sosteniu una peça d'armadura per canviar-la amb la peça que porteu actualment.
Equip/swap non-armor wearables
Enables right click to equip/swap non-armor items that can be equipped to armor slots, such as mob skulls.
També podeu canviar fent clic a l'armadura al vostre inventari mentre preneu una tecla modificadora que es pot configurar a les opcions de control de Minecraft.
Llista negra d'intercanvi d'armadura:

L'ús d'elements d'aquesta llista no s'intercanviarà
amb la teva armadura actual.
§c§lRequereix reinici§r
Activa l'obtenció de traduccions
Obtén noves traduccions del projecte Crowdin d'aquest mod
Trieu la pila d'ompliments de blocs
Si seleccioneu el bloc mentre ja teniu el bloc seleccionat, la pila que teniu a la mà es tornarà a omplir del vostre inventari.
El bloc de selecció no canvia mai l'espai
Si seleccioneu el bloc mentre el bloc al qual esteu apuntant és a la vostra barra d'acció, en comptes de canviar la ranura que heu seleccionat, aquest bloc s'intercanviarà a la vostra mà.
Drag item tweaks
Drag matching stacks across inventories

With an external inventory open (chest, dropper, etc. ),
click, hold, and drag a stack between the two
inventories to move all matching stacks.
You can also drag all stacks (not just matching) if you hold another modifier key, configurable in Minecraft's controls options.
Choose bottom row stacks first

When you use 'Drag matching stacks across inventories',
stacks will be moved from the bottom of inventories first.
Deposit cursor stack on release

When you use 'Drag matching stacks across inventories',
the stack you were dragging will be deposited upon release.
Drag single stack out of inventory

With an inventory open, click, hold, and drag a
stack outside the inventory to throw the stack.
Drag matching stacks out of inventory

With an inventory open, click, hold, and drag a stack
outside the inventory to throw it and all matching stacks.
Optionally requires a key to be held which can
be configured in Minecraft's controls interface.
When comparing stacks, ignore NBT
NBT stores things like enchantments, damage, and map data.
Offhand tweaks
Shift-click to partial offhand stack

If a partial stack of items is in your offhand,
shift-clicking another stack of the same type
of items will add those items to your offhand.
Shift-click any food item to offhand

Shift-clicking any food in your inventory while your
offhand is empty will move that food to your offhand.
Don't shift-click food items with negative effects to offhand

Excludes food with negative effects
from shift-clicking to your offhand.
List of items that shift-click to offhand:

Shift-clicking items in this list while your offhand
is empty will move those items to your offhand.
§c§lRequires restart§r
